com.mygdx.game.gameLogic.Characters

Class HeroLifesWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.gameLogic.Characters.Entity
      • com.mygdx.game.gameLogic.Characters.Character
        • com.mygdx.game.gameLogic.Characters.Hero
          • com.mygdx.game.gameLogic.Characters.HeroLifesWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CharacterInfo, HeroInfo, HeroLifesFeature

    public class HeroLifesWrapper
extends Hero
implements HeroLifesFeature
    Wrapper used on hero to use the lifes and immunity features.

      • takeLife

        public int takeLife()
        Description copied from interface: HeroLifesFeature
        Decreases the lifes of the hero by one. Once the hero's life reaches zero the life's wont go lower.
        Specified by:
        takeLife in interface HeroLifesFeature
        Returns:
        Number of lifes left.
